mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure buttons and navigation elements are more spaced out for easier tapping on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and consider implementing lazy loading for non-essential assets.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve on-page SEO by adding more keyword-rich content in headings and meta descriptions.
userExperienceTip: Consider streamlining the content layout for quicker access to key information.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form by reducing the number of fields and adding autofill options.
tips: Enhance SEO with targeted local keywords for better visibility in search engines.
